name: AddTrelloWebhook
description:
Create a new webhook on Trello.

This tool creates a new webhook in Trello, allowing users to receive updates about changes to boards or cards. Call this tool when you need to automate interactions or notifications based on Trello activities.

parameters.name: callback_url
parameters.description: A string for a valid URL that Trello can reach with `HEAD` and `POST` requests, used for receiving webhook payloads.

value_schema.description: A valid URL that is reachable with a `HEAD` and `POST` request.

parameters.name: model_id_to_monitor
parameters.description: ID of the Trello model (e.g., board or card) to monitor for updates.

value_schema.description: ID of the model to be monitored

parameters.name: webhook_description
parameters.description: Provide a description for the new webhook, with a length of 0 to 16384 characters.

value_schema.description: A string with a length from `0` to `16384`.

parameters.name: webhook_is_active
parameters.description: Indicates if the webhook is active and sending POST requests. True to activate, false to deactivate.

value_schema.description: Determines whether the webhook is active and sending `POST` requests.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the trello API.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: A string with a length from `0` to `16384`.

value_schema.description: A string with a length from `0` to `16384`.

parameters.name: callbackURL
parameters.description: A valid URL that is reachable with a `HEAD` and `POST` request.

value_schema.description: A valid URL that is reachable with a `HEAD` and `POST` request.

parameters.name: idModel
parameters.description: ID of the model to be monitored

value_schema.description: ID of the model to be monitored

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Determines whether the webhook is active and sending `POST` requests.

value_schema.description: Determines whether the webhook is active and sending `POST` requests.
